snippet: Cleveland made its first 11 3-point attempts, including nine in the first quarter, to rout Atlanta, and Toronto beat Utah for its sixth win in seven games.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Cleveland Cavaliers overwhelm Atlanta Hawks, 127-94; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Cleveland made its first 11 3-point attempts, including nine in the first quarter, to rout Atlanta, and Toronto beat Utah for its sixth win in seven games.

headline.main: Cavaliers Make 19 3-Pointers to Overwhelm Hawks; Grizzlies Continue Fast Start
headline.print_headline: Cavaliers Make 19 3-Pointers to Overwhelm Hawks; Grizzlies Continue Fast Start
